bio:
He is shackled to the stone wall within the torture chamber in the Dawnstar Sanctuary of the Dark Brotherhood. He is a Nord man. He has been stripped down to only his underwear. An old woman, a younger woman, and another man are also bound to the wall within this torture chamber. These four victims have been kidnapped by the Dark Brotherhood. These four victims have been kidnapped by the Dark Brotherhood, and have been subject to brutal torture.
Quotes:
"I'll tell you anything. Anything! Just please stop... hurting me..."
"I just... can't take the pain. Not a second longer."
"I'll give you money. Treasure. I have some things hidden away. Take them all. They're yours. Just please... stop."
If sufficiently tortured: "Just north of Windhelm. There's a hollowed-out rock. I have some things hidden in there. Take them! They're yours."
"I've told you everything I can. I don't know what else you could want..."
name: Torture Victim
